products.title: Classic
products.description: Our original, timeless recipe — moist, fluffy, and full of ripe banana goodness.

products.title: Choc Chip
products.description: A sweet twist on the classic, loaded with rich, melty chocolate chips.

products.title: Coconana
products.description: Tropical flavors meet home baking — fresh coconut flakes folded into banana batter.

products.title: Choc Chip Coconana
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with chocolate chips and coconut
products.description: The best of both worlds — creamy coconut and decadent chocolate chips in one loaf.

products.title: Heavy Choc
products.description: For serious chocolate lovers — a dense, ultra-rich chocolate banana bread.

products.title: Walnut Wonder
products.description: Crunchy toasted walnuts give this banana bread a nutty depth and satisfying texture.

products.title: Cinnamon Swirl
products.description: A warm cinnamon sugar swirl baked through the loaf for a cozy, spiced treat.

products.title: Blueberry Bliss
products.description: Juicy blueberries burst with sweetness in every bite of this moist loaf.

products.title: Peanut Butter Banana
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with peanut butter drizzle
products.description: A classic pairing — creamy peanut butter baked into moist banana bread.

products.title: Lemon Glaze
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with lemon glaze topping
products.description: A zesty lemon glaze brings brightness to the sweet banana base.

products.title: Mocha Banana
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with coffee and chocolate
products.description: Rich cocoa and espresso create a sophisticated banana bread blend.

products.title: Banana Berry Mix
products.description: Raspberries, blueberries, and strawberries add a fruity burst of flavor.

products.title: Almond Crunch
products.description: Lightly toasted almond slices give a delicate crunch to each bite.

products.title: Caramel Drizzle
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with caramel drizzle topping
products.description: A decadent caramel drizzle elevates this moist, flavorful loaf.

products.title: Pumpkin Spice Banana
products.imageAlt: Banana bread with pumpkin spice flavors
products.description: Seasonal pumpkin spice blends perfectly with sweet banana.
